SarvSahayak is a platform designed for silent sufferers. We aim to help people who are unable to raise their voice against crimes happening to them. Our mobile and web app offer a medium to the public through which they can report about injustices happening either to them or someone known/unknown to them. We are connected with reliable NGOs who take timely and efficient actions against the perpetrators and provide justice to the victims.
Name of Animal Location of victim .Description of incident
//FAQS -Ques 1. Is it necessary to provide your personal details while reporting an issue?
Ans 2. Yes, it is necessary to provide your details while reporting your issue but we assure you it will remain safe with us and will not be misused anywhere.
Ques 2. What kind of issues can we report? Ans 3. Domestic violence, animal abuse, and ragging are the issues we are covering right now
Ques 2. Are we only supposed to report others’ problems, can’t we report our own? Ans 3. You are always welcome to report your problems on our platform. Our app isn’t just for reporting other people’s problems, it is a medium where you can report any crimes happening to you or anyone known/unknown to you.
Ques 2. Is it necessary to provide photo/video proof while reporting? Ans 3. Yes, it is necessary to provide a video or photo while reporting your problem since some people misuse such platforms and can register false complaints against others. Even while taking action, evidence will be required, therefore, you need to give us proof.
Ques 2. Does the app work offline as well? Ans 3.Yes, the app works offline as well. You can send an SMS to the NGO and they’ll contact you.
//suusec Thank you Your complaint has been reported You will recieve report confirmation on email or message Back to home screen
